metadata.name: Sarira V6 #1
metadata.description: Sarira NFT is the engine fuel to obtain BOSO. It is a precious gem found in Sumati. Sarira of any grades can be fixed into Bodhi and continuously absorbs BOSO for players. There are six different types of Sarira gems, each contains different amount of BOSO. Each Sarira NFT is characterised by three attributes: value, efficiency and level. Its minting capability will depend on these three attributes.
